mapper.insert: insert into tbl_address(addr, addrDetail, id, addrName, recipient, memo, phone) values (#{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{id}, #{addrName}, #{recipient}, #{memo}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update tbl_address set addr = #{addr}, addrDetail = #{addrDetail}, addrName = #{addrName}, recipient = #{recipient}, memo=#{memo}, phone=#{phone} where addrNo = #{addrNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_address where id = #{id}
